subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: For two seasons with the Pistons, Darko Milicic, the No. 2 overall pick in the 2003 draft, was permanently attached to the bench. Now with the Magic, things are different.
snippet: For two seasons with the Pistons, Darko Milicic, the No. 2 overall pick in the 2003 draft, was permanently attached to the bench. Now with the Magic, things are different.
